column5: 7/20. Water looks low Anyone running rags last week?
No problem 4th of July. Be finding out how it is again in 6 days.
Was fine a week ago. Water seemed to be down about 2 feet.
Fishing was average. Good numbers, but lots of little ones. Battled wind that kept us from the main basin 2 of the 4 days though. Fish anywhere from 18-30 ft.
Curious as to what you consider the "main basin"? If you are running thru the rags you must be launching from Hudson or Deception? How much further are you going?
